      • DarklightWebSDK

        public DarklightWebSDK()
        Empty constructor, requires the APIProtocol, APIServer, and APISessionId to be set manually, and then to initiate the API call createAPI()

      • DarklightWebSDK

        public DarklightWebSDK(java.lang.String APIProtocol,
               java.lang.String APIServer,
               int APISessionId)
        Parameters:
        APIProtocol - Protocol the API server uses, usually http
        APIServer - Web address of the API server
        APISessionId - ID of the API session

        Parameters:
        name - The name to authorize
        Returns:

             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> desc)
        Send a score update to the server
        Parameters:
        score - The updated score
        desc - HashMap of fixed issues
        Returns:
        True if request returns with a 200 status code
